roleset.name: convert into or enrich with minerals
roleset.note: MINERALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mineralize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4, comparison with 'ionize.' (from mineralize.01-v predicate notes)
MINERALIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts. Arg2 added for the mineral at this point.

example.name: mineralize-v: Unaccusative
example.text: In these caverns the bones are not mineralized.

example.name: mineralization-n
example.text: The authors estimated nitrogen transferral rates through the soil food web and calculated nitrogen mineralization rates for a range of soil organisms .
